name: ProductOfferingPrice
comment: This entity contains the different price types whether simple price or table price. It includes price information such as name, description, and type.
vf short description: This entity contains the different price types whether simple price or table price. It includes price information such as name, description, and type.

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceKey
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the product offering price Generated key based on Product Offering Price Id

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceId
fields.comment: Uniquely identifies the product offering price price.id

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceInd
fields.comment: Indicates if it is simple price or complex(table driven price). price.type

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceName
fields.comment: Indicates the name of the price such as "Activation Charge", "Plan RC" and so on. price.name.value where price.name.locale = "en-US"

fields.name: ProductOfferingPriceDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the description of the price. price.description.value where price.description.locale = "en-US"

fields.name: RevenueTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates if the price is one time charge (OC) or recurring charge (RC). price.priceType

fields.name: RecurringChargePeriodTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates recurring charge period type, for example, week. price.recurringChargePeriodType

fields.name: RecurringChargePeriodDuration
fields.comment: Indicates recurring charge period length, for example, 4 (every 4 weeks). price.recurringChargePeriodLength

fields.name: PricePolicyId
fields.comment: Indicates the pricing policy. price.policy.id

fields.name: PricePolicyName
fields.comment: Indicates the pricing policy name. price.policy.name

fields.name: RoleInd
fields.comment: Defines the specific role of the product offering price, such as allowance, prepaid balance, spending limit, discount price.role

fields.name: CurrencyInd
fields.comment: Indicates the currency of the price. price.currency

fields.name: PublicFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the price is public i.e. shared amongst multiple product offerings. If price.isPublic = true then 1 else 0

fields.name: TaxIncludedFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if tax is included in the price. If price.taxIncluded = Included then 1 else 0

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
